title: Tiger 3
description: Special agents Tiger and Zoya set out to foil the schemes of a military group. However, the group's leader is very dangerous and deeply motivated by a personal grudge against Tiger.,.

title: Suzume
description: As the skies turn red and the planet trembles, Japan stands on the brink of disaster. However, a determined teenager named Suzume sets out on a mission to save her country. Able to see supernatural forces that others cannot .

title: The Monkey
description: When twin brothers find a mysterious wind-up monkey, a series of outrageous deaths tears their family apart. Twenty-five years later, the monkey begins a new killing spree, forcing the estranged siblings to confront the cursed toy.

title: Final Destination Bloodlines
description: Plagued by a violent and recurring nightmare, a college student heads home to track down the one person who might be able to break the cycle of death and save her family from the grisly demise that inevitably awaits them all.

title: Deyaler Desh
description: Boishakh discovers a dead body in the hospital morgue. It is Nohor, with whom he had a love affair seven years ago. After the death of her beloved, he steals her dead body from the hospital and flees to spend 24 hours with her.

title: Unish20
description: Unish20 is a 2023 Bangladeshi OTT film from the digital platform Chorki originals. It was directed by Mizanur Rahman Aryan. The film stars Arefin Shuvoo, Afsana Ara Bindu, Intekhab Dinar,.

title: Poran
description: Poran is a 2022 Bangladeshi romantic thriller film directed by Raihan Rafi and produced by Md Tamzid Ul Alam under his production banner Live Technologies. Inspired by true events.

title: Operation Sundarban
description: Operation Sundarbans or Operation Sundarban is a Bangladeshi action thriller movie. The film was co-written and directed by Dipankar Sengupta Dipon. The film was produced by RAB Welfare.

title: Sordar
description: A disgraced spy returns from a long exile to stop the launch of a suspicious water company which plans to spread toxic water across the country.

title: Jongli
description: A troubled university student, haunted by family trauma and heartbreak, descends into isolation--until an unexpected bond with a little girl forces him to confront his pain and choose between redemption or remaining lost.

title: Borbaad
description: After a heartbreak by Nitu, Ariyan Mizra seeks revenge, guided by his father Adib's wisdom. Their story transforms from romance to violence, culminating in courtroom confrontations over justice.

title: Daagi
description: Nishan, born into a middle-class family, dreams of getting rich fast. While his father urges him to pursue an honest living, Nishan chooses a riskier route-joining a gang in India led by a smuggler. His job: drug trafficking. Meanwhile, his girlfriend Jerin, who remains in Bangladesh, faces pressure from her family to marry.

title: Chokkor 302
description: Chokkor 302 is a crime thriller that keeps you hooked from the very beginning. The story follows a mysterious case full of suspense and unexpected twists. It's a type of film we don't often see in Bangladeshi cinema. The acting is excellent from every character.

title: Mohanagar S2
description: One fateful night, a police station in Bangladesh, and a motley crowd consisting of criminals, an eminent industrialist, media, general public..

title: Mohanagar S1
